Topic.Title: After downloading a quest? What now?

Posts.EditableText: I downloaded a quest but I'm wondering what do I use to run it.
Posts.HTML: I downloaded a quest but I'm wondering what do I use to run it.

Posts.EditableText:
I assume you downloaded a Quest game.

On the homepage, scroll down to products, select Quest, and select download.

Hopefully this answers your question.  If not, let us know!

Thanks.
Posts.HTML:
I assume you downloaded a Quest game.

Thanks.
